definition: office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: The report said the pipeline agency was hampered by a chronic inspector shortage.
sentences.chinese: 報告說，長期缺乏檢查員妨礙了管道安全局開展工作。

sentences.english: Use of global variables should be minimized.
sentences.chinese: 儘量減少全局變量的使用。

sentences.english: There is also an additional global run queue where new threads are placed.
sentences.chinese: 還有一個附加的全局運行隊列，其中放的是新的線程。

sentences.english: In oder to realize all-sided optimization, a improved genetic arithmetic be adopted.
sentences.chinese: 爲達到全局優化的目的，採用改進遺傳算法進行優化。

sentences.english: Our method Possesses global convergence under nondegenerate assumption.
sentences.chinese: 在非退化假設下，本文算法具有全局收斂性。

sentences.english: This's our opportunity to step back.
sentences.chinese: 那樣我們纔可以縱觀全局。

sentences.english: Data warehousing is an effective technique for decision-making support in range of whole enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 數據倉庫是支持企業全局決策的有效技術。

sentences.english: Flag issue is radical, and route issue is relating to overall phase.
sentences.chinese: 旗幟問題至關重要，道路問題事關全局。

sentences.english: The actual proof of convergence is generally not trivial.
sentences.chinese: 並在通常條件下證明了方法的全局收斂性。

sentences.english: It introduces the notion of Global Events available across all processes to be reacted upon.
sentences.chinese: 引入全局事件的概念，所有過程都可受它影響。

sentences.english: In the end, prospect of next generation GFS is presented.
sentences.chinese: 最後提出了對下一代全局文件系統的展望。

sentences.english: This directive could appear both in global and in per-virtual-site configuration files.
sentences.chinese: 這個指令可以在全局及站點配置文件中存在。

sentences.english: Tokens for site-wide settings and other global information.
sentences.chinese: 整站設置及其他全局信息的標識。

sentences.english: Tracking a global variable is much harder than a non-global variable.
sentences.chinese: 全局變量比普通變量更難查找。

sentences.english: The list of variables in the business state machine or process editor contains global variables.
sentences.chinese: 業務狀態機或流程編輯器中的清單列表包含全局變量。

sentences.english: Most changes to global or static data.
sentences.chinese: 大多數的全局或靜態數據的更改。

definition: to dispatch (vehicles, staff etc)/to schedule/to manage/dispatcher/scheduler
an overall plan taking into account all factors
to judge the hour and size up the situation/to take stock
lit. pull one hair and the whole body moves/fig. a slight change will affect everything else/the butterfly effect
pinyin: qian1 yi1 fa4 er2 dong4 quan2 shen1

definition: to be in overall charge/to have overall control
to transfer/to maneuver (troops etc)/movement of personnel/to mobilize/to bring into play
